title: Andrew Hart (rugby league)
text:
Andrew Hart (born 9 March 1976) is an <a href="Australian">Australian</a> former professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer.
Hart started his career at the <a href="Illawarra%20Steelers">Illawarra Steelers</a> (1997-1998) and then spent time at the <a href="St.%20George%20Illawarra%20Dragons">St. George Illawarra Dragons</a> (1999-2001) and the <a href="South%20Sydney%20Rabbitohs">South Sydney Rabbitohs</a> (2002-2003). Hart finished his playing career with a year in the <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a> with the .
